## BlockDragger.disconnectBlock\_() method

Disconnects the block and moves it to a new location.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected disconnectBlock_(healStack: boolean, currentDragDeltaXY: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  healStack | boolean | Whether or not to heal the stack after disconnecting. |
|  currentDragDeltaXY | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | How far the pointer has moved from the position at mouse down, in pixel units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
